column2: Would you like to attempt another one of my brain-tickling puzzles?
Today's puzzle is to make it so all 10 of these green balls are touching the red spiky ball at the same time.
Clearly you'll need to hack into Fizzics to do this.
Try adjusting the settings for attraction and repulsion.
What if you make the green balls smaller and the red one larger?

That's it! Good job!

By the way, I found that *cloaking glaze* you were looking for earlier. Here, take it.
Let me know if I can give you a hand with any interesting projects.
Suuuuure thing. You can always try later.
